title: Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 5.10 - 29/05/2015
body:
Summoners,

On 29/05/15, starting at 02:30 Sydney Time (16:30 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.10. At 04:00 Sydney Time (18:00 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. 

We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.

-ToxicHawk

Rito status on point, i rate 8/8
When will Ekko be available doe

Yo, update went out ... and Ekko not released?
Some issue going on, other countries have him already from the go?
Ekko will be coming out tomorrow im guessing then/
I'd say it's more likely sometime next week.
Was this patch not meant to be today? No Hate, was just really excited ahah :) @ToxicHawk

Patches usually happen on Thursdays (for OCE) but other forms of server maintenance affect when it happens, usually that will only push it back a day or two. Probably just that another server got some maintenance this week.
1 hour 30 mins of no ranked? disappointed m9
